overview.en: UGA (Universal Green Asset) is generated using a smart car device, that is plugged into the car 24/7. Car owners will be able to generate UGA by having a good driving behavior, UGA can be used to purchase any service that the platform provides, as well as trading on token exchange markets.
overview.zh: UGA（环球绿色资产）是使用智能汽车设备生成的，该设备24小时插入汽车OBD接口，读取车主行车数据，车主将能够通过具有良好的驾驶行为来生成UGA，UGA可用于购买平台提供的任何服务，以及在数字货币交易所进行交易。
